06:43:16 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
06:43:16 SQL> 06:43:16 SQL> --
06:43:16 SQL> -- merge.sql
06:43:16 SQL> --
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs15min.
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
06:43:16 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.19
06:43:16 SQL> RENAME ibs15min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.03
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.18
06:43:16 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.03
06:43:16 SQL> 
06:43:16 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
06:43:16   2  SELECT
06:43:16   3  tkr
06:43:16   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
06:43:16   5  ,clse
06:43:16   6  FROM ibs_stage
06:43:16   7  UNION
06:43:16   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
06:43:16   9  FROM ibs_old
06:43:16  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.39
06:43:17 SQL> 
06:43:17 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs15min COMPRESS AS
06:43:17   2  SELECT
06:43:17   3  tkr
06:43:17   4  ,ydate
06:43:17   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
06:43:17   6  FROM ibs_dups
06:43:17   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
06:43:17   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.21
06:43:17 SQL> 
06:43:17 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs15min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.53
06:43:17 SQL> 
06:43:17 SQL> -- rpt
06:43:17 SQL> 
06:43:17 SQL> SELECT
06:43:17   2  tkr
06:43:17   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
06:43:17   4  ,MIN(ydate)
06:43:17   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
06:43:17   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
06:43:17   7  ibs15min
06:43:17   8  GROUP BY tkr
06:43:17   9  /
